name: QuboSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn on Smart Plug”
”Alexa , show the camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to see what’s happening at home? With Qubo Smart Home Skill you can watch Live view from Qubo Cameras on Echo Spot and Echo Show, making it convenient to our customers. 
Say “ Alexa Show The Camera” or “Alexa Show <Camera Name>”

Qubo camera devices supported via this skill are camera models - Qubo Smart Indoor Camera, Qubo Smart Home Security Camera

The ability to control Qubo Smart plugs via Alexa voice commands simplifies the user experience. Say “ Alexa turn on <Smart Plug Name>” Alexa turn off <Smart Plug Name>”.

The other Alexa compatible Qubo sensors integrated via this Skill, include the Qubo Door Sensor.

At the Centre of all of this Intelligent solution is the Qubo Smart Indoor Camera for enabling the Sensors.

In order to setup Qubo devices please download “Qubo” app from Android and iOS. Use the easy to follow instructions in the App to successfully setup and enable the Qubo Smart Home skills from within the Qubo App.
